subject: Communication
title: The Brand Origin Story
description: Learn The Brand Origin Story in one minute.

hook.text: Apple started in a garage. Nike started with a waffle iron. The origin story is a brand's most powerful asset.

buildup.text: Origin stories humanize companies. They transform corporations into characters the audience can root for.

discovery.text: Research shows products with origin stories are valued 5-20% higher than identical products without one.

twist.text: Many famous origin stories are mythologized. The 'garage startup' narrative often glosses over privilege and funding.

climax.text: Authentic or not, origin stories work because they give audiences a narrative to believe in ‚Äî not just a product.

punchline.text: People don't buy products. They buy the story behind them.

quiz.question: How do origin stories affect product perception?
